synopsis.text:
They say the stars twinkle with unspoken tales, and for Kasumi Toyama, they whispered a rhythm she'd been chasing her whole life. As a child, the stars had filled her with an exhilarating thrill she yearned to rediscover. It wasn't until she stumbled upon a star-shaped guitar in a forgotten pawnshop that she found her answer. The guitar resonated with the same captivating energy as the stars, and Kasumi knew her destiny was to form an all-girl band.

Enrolling in a new school, Kasumi followed a trail of star-shaped signs that led her to a life-changing discovery: a star-shaped guitar. The guitar sparked a newfound determination within her, and she became resolute in her quest to form a band. But convincing the shop owner to sell her the guitar and finding like-minded girls to join her on this musical journey would prove to be challenging.

Determined to relive the heart-pounding excitement she once felt, Kasumi embarks on a mission to form a band with four kindred spirits: Saya, Arisa, Rimi, and Tae. Together, they set out on a journey to find the elusive 'Star Beat' and make their dreams of stardom a reality. Will they have what it takes to overcome the challenges that await them and deliver a performance that will light up the stage like the stars that inspired Kasumi's dream? Only time will tell, but one thing is for sure: Kasumi and her friends are ready to shine with all their might.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
